categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Neutron Star-class bulk cruiser was a class of bulk cruiser utilized by various factions, including the Alliance to Restore the Republic, during the Imperial Era.

The Neutron Star-class bulk cruiser was a class of highly customizable bulk cruiser manufactured by Rendili StarDrive that cost 2,800,000 credits to produce. The Rebel Alliance used this advantage to turn these vessels into carriers, which cost 2,871,000 credits and gave them the capability to carry thirty-six starfighters.

The Neutron Star-class was once used as a planetary defense force vessel. In the Alliance to Restore the Republic, they were often converted into carriers and used when Mon Calamari Star Cruisers were not available.

The Neutron Star-class was once popular and used by many planetary defense forces, but was then primarily used by mercenaries. During the Imperial Era, the Alliance to Restore the Republic added the bulk cruisers to their arsenal and converted them into carriers, assigning them to the Rebel Alliance Starfighter Corps.
